question:
Aviation authorities at one time issued $\(\qquad\)$ guidelines for hobbyists flying model airplanes, but in the absence of definitive laws, some individuals have chosen to ignore the recommendations.
Two Answers
A. regular
B. discretionary
C. voluntary
D. firm
E. insufficient
F. unvarying
